website_summaries.verdict: A gentle formula that minimizes irritation and can be used all over the body. Removes hair in as little as four minutes.
pros: Natural plant ingredients are gentle on the skin
Can be applied to the chest, back, arms, legs, and armpits
Includes plastic scraper to help remove cream
cons: Some users find they have to trim longer hair to effectively remove it

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using depilatory creams for years. Gave this one a shot. The smell isn't too bad, relative to others I've used. It didn't burn, but it didn't do a good job of removing the hair. The tube was half empty when it arrived. OK, so they put 60ml (2.1 oz.) in a 4 oz. tube. This is VERY expensive for the amount you get. I'm going back to that big orange bottle that Sally Hansen sells--13.5 oz for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Quinby

customer_reviews.title: Works great down under too!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great but read the directions do not leave it on more than four or five minutes I made the mistake the first time because I got busy doing something else and left it on for over 10 minutes you do not want to do that it will take the skin off if you do it properly it is a fantastic product and makes manscaping so easy about every 3 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Pete D Conn

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated without burning or rash. For me allowing the cream to set for 6 minutes was perfect. Easy removal and clean up. I rubbed body lotion in the area shortly after.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and useless
customer_reviews.text: I had to prep for a vasectomy and didn't want to attempt razors on my nugs. I bought this and used it as directed....twice. Both times were unfruitful, except for the second degree chemical burns. I eventually ended up using a razor with trembling hands. Try a different product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well first off you should always check to see if you are going to have a bad reaction to hair removal cream. I put a small bit on the side of my leg to check and after feeling no pain at all, I went ahead and applied a generous amount to my more 'sensitive' areas. I've got dark thick hairs and it works just as advertised. Simply follow the directions and you'll be fine. Also for those who get allergic reactions, don't lower a rating because YOU aren't compatible with a product that works and even warns that you can have one and tells you how to test it, that's all on you.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Works well but burns
customer_reviews.text: This cream works really well and does the job. It actually removes the hair, just follow the instructions and keep it on for a while. However, it burns a lot. In doing the job this is a lot easier than shaving and removes the hair completely much better than just trimming. And the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy 1

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Even Work At All
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was so excited of getting tis product! When I was in the shower applied the product waited for 10mins+more NOTHING AT ALL. And 16.99 for a little amount not even worth it that's my fault for not looking at size. This is my fist ever review and hopefully I don't have to lave a bad one after today. Instagram -- Jeremy_AWalsh
customer_reviews.author: JeremyAllenWalsh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Messy, smelly, burned my skin and after following the directions to a Tee 80% of the hair was still there only now my skin was red and slightly burning. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Sunyde

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable
customer_reviews.text: The product is genuine and the packaging is very satisfactory. The arm is very good and works very well. After using this for a while, the hairs became thinner and grew slower. The skin becomes more moisturized and smoother. The product is generally good, no smell, no skin irritation, no allergies. There is also soothing water inside, and all the hair on the hind legs are scraped dry, not painful, and very clean without leaving traces. The skin becomes more moisturized, smooth and white
customer_reviews.author: John Toto

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive area removal? NO PROBLEM!
customer_reviews.text: It worked! 10 mins flat chest and back... I did the chest first and wiped off then cleaned off with warm water in shower.. dried off then had my wife apply to my back... amazing! My wife was amazed too!
customer_reviews.author: seyla

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: Used as directed, and did not remove the coarse pubic hairs, don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Winger

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great for me and gave me the desired results quickly and painlessly - no nicks, no cuts ... no little hairs all over the bathroom. Also, the smell wasn't nearly as bad as some reviews made it out to be. If you're tired of shaving your boys I'd definitely give this stuff a try. But be cautious though ... everyone's skin and hair are different.
customer_reviews.author: Kayloni Campbells'd

customer_reviews.title: Great results and great value! Won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love that this stuff is so cheap and no pain at all! Easy to use and you’ll love the results
customer_reviews.author: Lannonq

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal! Never used anything like this beforehand, and the results were amazing. Truly, no more than 5 min. & it removed pubic & 'backside' hair just as easily as leg hair. I am a moderately hairy guy, I also have always had sensitive skin. This product TRULY had no aftereffects, no skin irritation. Remember that I used it on areas 'not recommended', it worked awesome!! I didn't use a soft cloth for removal, I used the shower head, in the shower, and my other hand rubbing. Just make sure that you have a hair trap over the drain, no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia J Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have people who are terrible at getting rid of their body hair.I've tried some products that have a bad effect on my skin.But this is useful for me.I use it under my belt, and it makes everything nice and smooth and unexciting.It doesn't cause the itch and irritation I get when I shave, which is a miracle in itself!Besides, they look clean and comfortable.Can trust to buy!
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE NDANG

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Does the job for your private areas. I've noticed that the hair grows back thinner after the third application. I thought it would smell better than other hair removal creams. This product works well for my hair. I put them on my skin for 8 minute, then the hair can be wiped out at all! This product works well for my hair.hopefully you are braver than I!
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rehan

customer_reviews.title: Looking Younger!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for many years and cannot imagine my daily skin care routine without it. I searched and tried many products before trying cellfood but they only left my skin feeling suffocated, dry or oily. This is the perfect natural product for my skin. My skin feels and looks smooth and has a healthy glow. love it, love it, love it. Please don't ever stop making this formula.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dean

customer_reviews.title: Hair be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Stinks like hell but doesn’t burn or leave rashes on my skin. I leave it on for about 45-50 min and it does wonders!
customer_reviews.author: A. King

customer_reviews.title: Works better than imagined, everywhere on your body! 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works Fantastic!!! They say don’t use it on your family jewels but I did! Worked Great, no burning no discomfort at all! Hair is 100% Gone Boy! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Skyhook

customer_reviews.title: Husband's legs are smooth now!
customer_reviews.text: Husband's leg hair. I can't talk about it. The group can't stand the hairs on their legs when he touches me. Then I bought this man's special hair removal cream in Amazon. The effect is really good. Now my husband's leg hair is going to be wiped out by him. His legs become very smooth. My husband is very surprised. I also like him now, love you!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: hair be gone
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions on the bottle and it worked as advertised. I've heard of some people getting rashes from using it but I've never had that happen to me. As long as you follow the instructions exactly as they are printed, it should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: If you want a terrible product, this is your pick
customer_reviews.text: This is a Chinese product. The instructions are in hard to understand and comical English. I tried the product it on a test spot on my arm. After 8 minutes of application, it did not remove any hair, but did burn the crap out of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly wonderful results
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical at first, but it worked great! I have a very hairy body and my hair grows out very fast after shaving especially around the chest/stomach area. Shaving doesn't always work due to the amount of hair. It takes multiple shaves to get the job done. However this hair removal cream was able to remove the hair quickly and easily..
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Gets everything off!
customer_reviews.text: As someone that has tried several other cheaper wax in hopes to save a buck, I have always returned to this and will never try another brand again. Trust me, pay a little extra because it is totally worth it! i use this with the lotion/oil that the brand also carries and have never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: tracy gonia & jeff sheadel

customer_reviews.title: Love my Item... big recommendation from me
customer_reviews.text: It arrived just as I was getting home from work. As fast as I was able, I tore open the box, applied liberally to my ass-fro. Within minutes the pipes in my house were all clogged with said butt hair! If that doesn't speak for itself I just don't know what does! Thank you for such an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Sequoia Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I need it very much
customer_reviews.text: The effect is quite good, and now the hairs of the hands are getting scarcer, and it is really authentic. After using it, it is not allergic. The key is that the skin on the hands is still delicate. It is smooth and moist. The taste is light and fragrant. It is very gentle to use and quite comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Best...(worst...?) skin rash I’ve ever had.
customer_reviews.text: This gave me a rash that lasted for six weeks. I don’t even have sensitive skin. I can’t recommend this based on my own experience.
customer_reviews.author: HarvyDanger Films

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Down. 👎👎👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Absolute waste of time sent it back it smelled terrible and didn't do what's expected. Thumbs down on this product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was given as a gift to a person with disabilities and sits for long periods of time, eventually getting a sore neck. With the use of this pillow he feels much better. It is a great product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anna M.

customer_reviews.title: ... and I was told to get a traveling pillow like this-it is very soft and adheres to your neck ...
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis in my neck and shoulder and I was told to get a traveling pillow like this-it is very soft and adheres to your neck and is very comfortable -I sit up in bed with this on and before I go to bed I have no pain what so ever best thing I ever invested in
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Let it sit on skin for about 10 minutes maybe 12 it works
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your product it does work no pain especially around the ears. I have tried other products that actually burn my skin till now.
customer_reviews.author: Mike AF

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: After the hair removal cream is used, the skin is fragrant and smooth. And after a long time, the leg hair became thinner and softer. Now my skin is very clean and smooth. It inhibits hair growth and the quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Alsup Caulk

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!!!Great product
customer_reviews.text: It has like very mild smell. I've got dark thick hairs and it works just as advertised. Simply follow the directions and you'll be fine. Also for those who get allergic reactions, don't lower a rating because YOU aren't compatible with a product that works and even warns that you can have one and tells you how to test it, that's all on you. I love this and it helps smooth out my hairless arms and other places ;)
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lorenzetti

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with this stuff. I was absolutely bewildered at first use because I’ve never seen hair with the texture of cooked pasta! Haha. That’s exactly what this will do. You just wipe it off with a cloth and they effortlessly break off at the skin. Only con is it smells bad. A weird permed hair sort of smell but turn the fan on and it’ll dissipate in an hour or so. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelmina Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT use on Wet Skin! Works wonders!!
customer_reviews.text: It did the job and it did it fast, with no pain or hassle. I used this item for my downstairs and just went to town with piling it ontop, I figured I would use copious amounts and if I felt ANY pain, I would back out instantly. I applied a thick coating all around and it took me 6 minutes to get it evenly applied. I waited an additional 4 minutes for the 10 minute Maximum and then wiped away tumbleweed after tumbleweed.
customer_reviews.author: Lara  Sowers

customer_reviews.title: I found this to be a cool product. I had to get used to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a cool product. I had to get used to the adjustment with the drawstring to the level that is comfortable for me but other than that, it served the purpose! My neck is supported and I admit it's a little bulky but, isn't plush is what you're after? ;)
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: work well
customer_reviews.text: This cream works really well and does the job. It actually removes the hair, just follow the instructions and keep it on for a while. For me allowing the cream to set for 6 minutes was perfect. Easy removal and clean up. And the price is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: bena

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Didn't burn my skin like some other products have. I'm very pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: NOT PICTURED PRODUCT! DOES NOT WORK!!!
customer_reviews.text: What else can I say? Used it according to directions TWICE and it didn't work. The only effect was that my skin got irritated. The instructions are translated so badly that it should have been a clue to throw it directly in the trash. Shame on Amazon for allowing this product!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: manscaping for yourself or your partner.
customer_reviews.text: Everything down there is completely hairless and butter smooth. I didn't even bother trimming first. Left it on for minutes before wiping it off. Very slight tingling and mild odor. The odor was quickly eliminated with a shot of air freshener. I love this and it helps smooth out my hairless arms and other places
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra O'Donnell

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice medium to firm neck pillow that offers excellent support
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice medium to firm neck pillow that offers excellent support. I wish it came in different sizes becauseI have a small neck so it does cause my neck to push forward when sitting which causes some strain. I gave it to my husband and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works but you actually need more than one if you want to use it on your chest
customer_reviews.author: O~O

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Was really worried about chemical burns but went for it anyway. 0 burn anywhere to include the most sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: Brian F.

customer_reviews.title: Dont throw away your money
customer_reviews.text: I am a 6' tall 200lb man who used this on my shoulders and butt. I used half the tube on one application and left it on for a few minutes longer than the instructions because it does not sting at all. However, it also does not remove hair at all. I will continue with nair.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job effectively!
customer_reviews.text: When the time comes to rinse off you'll rub the cream off your body and find a handful of hair on the palms of your hand. I always thought this could happen due to other activities ...Does the job effectively!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Telfer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: I have thick, dense, coarse, fast growing hair, as bad as it gets, yet this works well enough. I use in areas which are hard to shave/epilate, like shoulder blades, collar bones and upper chest, and as an occasional substitute for shaving.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Just like the ones from the store
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because i have quite a bit of hair in a certain body area. This worked fast and great. The only downside is the scent lingers. You may need to wash for awhile to nullify the scent.Great product. Convenience of application while in the shower is extra awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: The hair removal cream is not irritating at all, and it does not hurt when used. It is particularly gentle and particularly easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very good, mild and non-irritating, more importantly, it doesn't hurt at all, and cleaning is very convenient. Very affordable, but also specially checked the finer is the authentic, soothing water really has the effect of inhibiting hair growth, and the pores have become much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Charissas Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does what it says removes hair with ease and does not sting or hurt at all. By far the best hair removal product that I have used.If you do I'm sure you will be happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Aniesha Campbell

customer_reviews.title: It is not for intimate parts!
customer_reviews.text: They lied that it is good for intimate parts of the body. In the instructions inside the box, it is clearly written that you should you apply the cream to the arms and legs hair removal. I tried to remove armpit hair. It slightly irritated. So, did not risk to use it in other sensitive parts.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Trim hair short before you use
customer_reviews.text: This stuff wasnt strong enough to break down my chest hair. I recommend trimming it short before applying cream. Instructions are translated to English terribly.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the product regardless the reviews I read. Yes it pains like hell and is really time consuming as compared to trimming or shaving but it leaves a clean look. Don't forget to go through the instructions before using it and you'll be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Horwitz

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time removing hair from my chest, shoulders and back. I would strongly recommend trimming as much hair as possible before getting started - my hair was quite coarse and long. I didn't experience any soreness. All in all, a good purchase which does the job.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent!

customer_reviews.title: Does not work to ell

customer_reviews.title: hair gone
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works amazing. I recommend to anyone who is sick of cutting themselves when trying to shave hair off their body.
customer_reviews.author: Rajini Ramsukh

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew about this miracle cream sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I leave it on for 8 minutes and we jump in the shower and the hair wipes off, leaving me smooth for a month.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mytro

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow. Super cushy memory foam. The wine color is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Christina D.

customer_reviews.title: Blew My Mind!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly didn't think it would work very well but I was wrong. Works way better then expected with no feeling on sensitive areas

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Tried this hoping it would work but no such luck! Did not even remove a single hair and followed directions to the letter!

customer_reviews.title: Far better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Does what it's supposed to do. The smell isn't as bad. And it keeps your skin smooth after you remove the hair.
customer_reviews.author: LLOYD CHANG

customer_reviews.title: simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: Super effective . It does what its supposed to. Unless one has a very sensitive skin, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Chrispell

product_meta.title: Hair Removal Cream for Men, Depilatory Cream, Natural Painless Permanent Thick Hair Removal Cream + Plastic Scraper, Used on Bikini,Underarm,Chest, Back, Legs and Arms for Men, 60ml
product_meta.description: Description: Have you ever wished someone would develop a safe, effective solution to your unwanted hair growth problems? If yes, congratulations! You found it. This product is a kind of effective hair removal cream, Effectively removes hair in as little as five minutes, so it is safe to use anywhere on the body. Specification: Material: Cream Color: White Net content: 60ml Apply skin: Ordinary skin Suitable for: Men How to use: 1. Apply the cream Using your hand, smooth the hair removal cream over the area to be treated in a thick and even layer. 2. Ensure hair is covered For best results, completely cover hair with a thick and even layer of cream. Do not rub in. The cream will dissolve the hair right below the skin surface. 3. Wait 4 to 10 minutes Leave cream on the skin for at least 4 minutes. Using a soft cloth or tissue, test a small area for hair removal. If hair does not come away easily, leave the cream on for a few more minutes without exceeding 10 minutes in total. 4. Wipe away Wipe cream and hair away using a soft cloth or tissue. Rinse the treated area with water and pat dry. 5. All done! Enjoy smooth hair-free skin without the pain. Package includes: 1*Hair Removal Cream for Men 1*Plastic Scraper Precautions: For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Test area to be treated first to check for sensitivity. If it is no problem in 24 hours, you can start to use it. It is disabled to be used for inflamed and impaired skin surface, people that has a history of allergies uses cautiously . Please place in a shade place and avoid high temperature and direct sunlight.
feature_bullets: FUNCTION: Gentle formula, clean hair removal, less irritation. Effectively removes hair in as little as five minutes. Remove a large area of body hair, not easily residue, feel the skin silky touch feeling. This fast and painless hair removal cream is as easy to apply as it is effective at eliminating the appearance of unwanted hair growth on the face & body.

MAIN INGREDIENT: Water, chamomile flower extract, cetearyl alcohol, glyceryl monostearate, propylene glycol, polydimethylsiloxane, hydroxyethyl cellulose etc. Natural plant ingredients, gentle skin care, no irritation, anti-allergy, safe to use. 3. SCOPE OF APPLICATION: Suitable for all skin types, Ideal for body, underarm, arms, bikini, and legs. armpit hair, body hair of the bikini area hair removal effect is best, suitable for individuals and families.

SAFE TO USE: This product is aims at a safest solution to your unwanted hair growth problems. Contains natural Ingredients, it’s gentle on your skin and won’t cause itchiness, irritation, breakout, burning, or peeling in sensitive areas like the bikini line. in the hair when providing moisture touch, balance the skin to restore soft. Do not stay back roots, slow down hair root growth rate degree.

SCOPE OF APPLICATION: Suitable for all skin types, Ideal for body, underarm, arms, bikini, and legs. armpit hair, body hair of the bikini area hair removal effect is best, suitable for individuals and families.

PRECAUTIONS: It is disabled to be used for inflamed and impaired skin surface, people that has a history of allergies uses cautiously Please place in a shade place and avoid high temperature and direct sunlight. Report incorrect product information
